scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run lint && node test/index.js
scripts.vendor: npm run vendor:resultify && npm run vendor:error && npm run vendor:json-stringify-safe
scripts.vendor:resultify: cp node_modules/resultify/index.js resultify.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from resultify@1.1.2.\n// @ts-nocheck\n;' resultify.js;
scripts.vendor:error: cp node_modules/error/index.js error.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from error@10.2.0.\n// @ts-nocheck\n;' error.js;
scripts.vendor:json-stringify-safe: cp node_modules/json-stringify-safe/stringify.js json-stringify-safe.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from json-stringify-safe@5.0.0.\n// @ts-nocheck\n;' json-stringify-safe.js
